liveDragDropBuilder.name: Live Drag & Drop Builder
liveDragDropBuilder.description: Click & Drop content on a page and watch your pages come to life. Bring your vision to life and create impressive pages using a click & drop Page Builder

trueVisualEditing.name: True Visual Editing
trueVisualEditing.description: See your changes in real-time as you make them. Elevate your creative vision and create pages using an intuitive click & drop page builder. Break free from design limitations and turn your visions into reality.

features.name: Features
features.description: Click & Drop, Reordering, True Visual Editing, Responsive Editing, Font Customization, Undo & Redo, Text Editing, Media Library, Unsplash Integration, YouTube Videos.

technologies.name: Technologies
technologies.description: Developed with TypeScript, Vue 3, Composition API, Pinia, CSS, Tailwind CSS and HTML.

setBrandAndLinkColors.name: Set Brand and Link Colors one place
setBrandAndLinkColors.description: Global Styles for fonts, designs, & colors. Set Brand and Link Colors once and apply them across the entire Platform with ease.

mobileFirstApproach.name: Mobile-First Approach
mobileFirstApproach.description: Developed with Mobile-First approach. The Page Builder even works on mobile phones.

mediaLibrary.name: Media Library
mediaLibrary.description: A beautiful and user-friendly media library that allows you to change and update images. Unsplash Integration is included.

minimalIntuitiveDesign.name: Minimal and Intuitive Design
minimalIntuitiveDesign.description: Beautiful, elegant and intuitive design. Enhance user engagement with amazing visual experience.

branding.mainHeader: Bring your vision to life and create impressive pages using a click & drop Page Builder
branding.description: The web builder for stunning pages. Enable users to design and publish modern pages at any scale. Build responsive pages like listings, jobs or blog posts and manage content easily using the free click & drop Page Builder. Developed with TypeScript, Vue 3, Composition API, Pinia, CSS, Tailwind CSS and HTML. Download or install our powerful, flexible, and easy-to-use free Vue 3 Page Builder.
branding.downloadDescription: Download or install our powerful, flexible, and easy-to-use free Vue 3 Page Builder via

classEditor.title: Generated CSS
classEditor.info: This is the CSS applied by the builder. Add your own CSS and press Enter to apply it to the selected element.
classEditor.prefix: The pbx- prefix is added automatically.

styleEditor.title: Inline Styles
styleEditor.info: These are the inline styles applied by the builder. Add your own styles and press Enter to apply them to the selected element.

rightSidebar.globalPageStylesDescription: Apply styles that affect the entire page. These settings include global font family, text color, background color, and other universal styles that apply to all sections.
rightSidebar.downloadHtmlDescription: Export the entire page as a standalone HTML file. This includes all sections, content, and applied styles, making it ready for use or integration elsewhere.
